Name: Fremdganger - The Cheating Demon
About the game: Burnt out on the dullness of your play sessions, you voyage into the mountains to seek out a legendary Game Master. However, you quickly regret your decision after his game becomes a tad too real and involves you in an unexpected way... In Fremdganger - The Cheating Demon , you can: Make meaningful decisions to influence the fate of the protagonists Solve reality-breaking puzzles through the RETURN mechanic Explore two layers of existence: The Storyteller's hut in a 3D first-person perspective, and the tabletop world in a top-down 2D perspective Immerse yourself and forget your surroundings.
